name: 38th Asia-Pacific Association of Cataract & Refractive Surgeons (APACRS) Annual Meeting 2026
content: The 38th Asia-Pacific Association of Cataract and Refractive Surgeons (APACRS) annual meeting, organized by the APACRS, will be held from 4 â€“ 6 June 2026 in Pattaya, Thailand. This meeting offers a unique platform to interact with cataract and refractive surgeons from the Asia-Pacific region and beyond, keeping them informed about the latest ophthalmic advancements and industry trends. Stay tuned for more details!
organizers: Asia-Pacific Association of Cataract & Refractive Surgeons (APACRS)
